item.description:
American Le Mans Northeast Grand Prix

July 6 – 7, 2012, American Le Mans Series Northeast Grand Prix

The fastest and “greenest” prototypes and GTs – the same cars and stars that race at the 24 Hours of Le Mans and Road Atlanta’s Petit Le Mans – makes this a frenetically paced two days of outstanding ALMS racing. The top LMP cars are as sophisticated as F1 machines, and nowhere else in the northeast will you have the chance to get this close to the cars. Also racing: The all-new Unlimited Racing Championship – new, state of the art race cars that look and sound just like the wicked Can-Am cars of the 60s. Do not miss this show!

 

This is the schedule for the day:

Saturday July 7, 2012

7:00 AM                            Outfield and Main Entrance Open

8:30 AM                            Motorsports Miniseries Chapel Services (on the paint)

10:00 AM – 10:30 AM      Warm Up  ALMS (ALL CLASSES)

10:45 AM – 11:15 AM      Exhibition – Ultimate Racing Championship

11:30 AM – 11:45 AM      Vitesses Program

11:45 AM – 12:45 PM       LUNCH BREAK

12:45 PM – 1:15 PM         Exhibition – Ultimate Racing Championship

1:30 PM – 3:00 PM            Pre Race / Vitesses Program

3:05 PM – 5:50 PM            ALMS Race Round 4



 

More info here: http://www.limerock.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=57&Itemid=59

Buy tickets here: http://tickets.limerock.com/orderticketsarea.asp?p=428&a=2&backurl=%2Feventperformances.asp%3Fevt%3D1%26SearchMonth%3D%26monthsubmit%3D%26SearchText%3D%26Go.x%3D%26Go.y%3D%26pg%3D%26spg%3D1%26c%3...
item.name: Limerock ALMS race
